title: Carrier's New Abound Net Zero Management Solution Helps Building Portfolio Customers Reach Energy and ... - PR Newswire
summary: Carrier has launched Abound™ Net Zero Management, a new digitally-enabled lifecycle sustainability solution that helps building owners track their energy and carbon performance. This solution allows for standardized data collection and reporting, facilitating the achievement of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) goals. It provides insights into energy usage, cost reduction opportunities, and emissions reduction measures.

title: Sinopec Launches the World's Largest Green Hydrogen-Coal Chemical Project in Inner Mongolia - PR Newswire
summary: Sinopec, a major Chinese energy company, has launched the world's largest green hydrogen-coal chemical project in Inner Mongolia. This project, which will use renewable solar and wind energy to produce green hydrogen, is a significant step towards China's green energy goals and aims to reduce carbon emissions by 1.43 million tons annually. The project represents a milestone in Sinopec's hydrogen development roadmap and will expand green hydrogen production capacity globally.
product_or_process: Inner Mongolia Erdos Wind-Solar Green Hydrogen Project
